title.rendered: Can there be an easy and reliable helper app?

content.rendered:
Helper App!

Yes, it is possible to find helpers near you online.

Check Helpers Near Me & find it yourself.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Helper App! All your doubts about a Helper App are genuine.

And yet there is a Helper App that helps you connect with 100+ different profiles of blue-collar workers from nearby – Helpers Near Me.

Thus far, finding workers through an App would have been beyond one’s imagination, but here it is.

So you can find them and many more at Helpers Near Me, whether you are looking for Domestic Workers, School Workers, Restaurant Workers, Factory Workers, or Construction Workers.

How much does a Helper cost? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Helper?

The average monthly cost of hiring a Helper is around ₹12,000 to ₹13,000, depending on the Helper profile you are looking for.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the cost of Helpers near you? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Helpers near you.

In India, when you are looking for Workers for your home or your workplace or your business, here is the usual process that most of us follow:

  1. We would first reach out to our close references – friends, neighbours, colleagues, and whoever else lives close to our home or your workplace
  2. We would then reach out to current workers working at our place and ask them if they are someone who would be interested in the work we have at hand.
  3. And at times when the need is urgent, we even reach out to the agencies and contractors who work as placement agents.

Whichever process we follow, in the end, it is either or some of the following:

  1. Long wait till we end up finding someone
  2. Enough efforts in reaching out to the close or distant links
  3. Reliance on individual references and word of mouth
  4. Pay a huge amount of commission to the agents/contractors, or
  5. Live with the issue of managing things somehow till you find someone

Think about it: This whole process of finding a worker is always taxing and time-consuming.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me is a few years old DIPP-recognized social startup. The platform works closely with the Government and a few NGOs to help Blue-collar workers in local employment.

It enables the Workers to find local employment free of cost.

In turn, it helps Employers like yourself find workers near you without any middlemen in between.

Learn more about the platform and find yourself how it works.

Also, check out how customers review Helpers Near Me.

As mentioned earlier, you can find all of them and many more at Helpers Near Me, whether you are looking for Domestic Workers, School Workers, Restaurant Workers, Factory Workers, or even Construction Workers.

Through the Helper App of Helpers Near Me, you need to follow these 5 extremely easy steps, and you should be able to find multiple Helpers near you within 5 minutes.

1st Step: Visit Helpers Near Me, follow the ‘Find & Hire Now’ button and Login

2nd Step: Enter the profile of the Helper you are looking for & Confirm your search location

3rd Step: View profiles of multiple Helpers near you, with their ratings, background checks, distance, etc.

4th Step: Pay a nominal fee (starting at ₹99 only) and connect with every Helper featured in your search result.

5th Step: Speak with all of them, meet with whoever you want and hire anyone you like from the list

And once you’ve hired a Helper of your choice, pay the monthly salary directly to the person, without any commission to any middlemen.

Now, compare this with all the hassle you had to go through when you were looking for a Cook, Maid, Driver or any other Worker earlier – a lot of references here & there, a long wait and in the end only 1-2 Workers who had knocked your door, etc.

On the contrary, if you try the Helper App of Helpers Near Me, you will save all the trouble you had to go through before to find good Workers near you.

Furthermore, here are 11 promising reasons why you should try the Helper App of Helpers Near Me when you are searching for Helpers:

1) Convenient, Easy & Organized

Helpers Near Me is an Easier, Simpler & Better way of finding Helpers.

5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons that’s all it takes to find Helpers at Helpers Near Me.

Finding Workers was never as easier and as organised earlier.

2) Professionally Verified Helpers only

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Worker registered with the platform.

Everyone individual’s ID & Court/Criminal Records are checked in detail at the neighbouring District Courts around their addresses.

Learn more about the 2/3 Step Verification Process at Helpers Near Me.

Furthermore, you can also get your current Worker verified by this process. It does not matter if they were hired from Helpers Near Me or elsewhere.

The primary objective is to help you get proper due diligence done for your helper before hiring him/her or soon after you’ve hired him/her.

3) With the Helpers App, connect with many nearby Helpers

Helpers Near Me connects you with Helpers in the vicinity, preferably within 1-2 km of your search location.

They may be Helpers available for the full day or just for a few hours.

4) Speak to multiple Helpers at a time

If available, Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple helpers nearby, not just one or two.

Honestly, you also want choices, and always!

Moreover, when you want to hire a Worker permanently, you always want to meet with a few before deciding who to hire.

To give you enough choice, Helpers Near Me tries to connect you with as many options as around.

5) Find & Hire Helpers at a nominal fee only

At Helpers Near Me, you can connect with multiple Helpers at a starting fee of ₹99.

There are no additional charges beyond this.

Except only when you want access to the Worker’s background verification report.

But the report is also available to you at a nominal fee of Rs.199/-

So, technically, the entire transaction happens at a nominal fee only.

Unlike many maid service agencies, there are no commissions at Helpers Near Me.

A nominal fee is all that you pay.

6) Get best-rated Helpers on the app from a vast pool of workers from around

A unique rating system allows Helpers Near Me to connect you with the best workers around your search location.

This unique rating system at Helpers Near Me is one of a kind.

The Rating System is designed on a sophisticated algorithm, which ensures you always get the best option.

7) Empowers the Helpers to connect with you directly

Helpers Near Me supports the Workers in finding nearby work opportunities.

The platform does so by connecting the Workers directly with you.

By connecting directly with you, the Helper can decide and opt for the work out of his/her own will.

No one influences his/her decision.

Furthermore, the Helper gets to decide his/her salary as well.

In turn, this process helps him/her take control of their life and source of income.

The Workers join Helpers Near Me willingly and free of cost.

8) No middlemen & commissions in between on the Helper app at Helpers Near Me

At Helpers Near Me, since you connect with the nearby Workers directly, there are no middlemen & commissions in between.

Traditionally, maid service agencies have always made their commissions in between. They charge commissions from you, as well as the Workers.

At Helpers Near Me. there are no such commissions in between.

It is a straightforward digital platform that brings you and the workers together so that you connect and take care of each other’s requirements.

9) The Helper gets to earn his/her full salary

Every worker hired through Helpers Near Me gets an opportunity in life to earn a full salary.

They get all they earn without paying commissions to someone else in between.

Even now, many maid service agencies and contractors who provide housekeeping services at offices take salaries directly from you or the company and pay the worker after deducting a monthly percentage.

Unlike the maid service agencies, the Workers here earn their full salary by connecting with you directly.

10) Safe & Secure Payment

Every transaction processed at Helpers Near Me goes through recognised payment gateways like Paytm, PayU & others.

Your details are entirely secured & protected against any unauthorised transactions.

11) Customer-friendly Refund Policy

Helpers Near Me follows an excellent Customer-friendly Refund policy.

Every transaction you go through here is assured to help you find a worker you might want to search for on the platform.

For every genuine reason, the refunds at Helpers Near Me are processed without any questions asked.

Learn more about the Customer-Friendly Refund Policy at Helpers Near Me.

Imagine this kind of convenience of the Helper App on your mobile phone. And finding a Helper near you in just 5 minutes & 5 easy steps.

This comfort solves all the trouble you had to take otherwise to find a Helper.

So, next time you need to find a worker, try Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me is the easiest way to find a Worker near you.

Helpers Near Me has many Workers registered on its platform who work at Homes, Offices & Small Businesses, like Maids, Drivers, Babysitters, Security Guards, Beauticians for your Parlour business, Helpers for Elders, Car Washers and many others.

Quick Links:

To find & hire workers near you, try Helpers Near Me.

Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Refer to some of our Customer Reviews. Find what they have to say about Helpers Near Me.

Legally Verify the credentials of your Maid, Driver, Security Guards, Babysitters, Cooks, Gardener or any other workers. Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Want to get quick answers to some of your questions? Read our FAQs section.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
